PUBLIC SAFETY COMMITTEE
COMMITTEE MEETING
~ AGENDA ~

Wednesday, July 28, 2021

2:00 PM

Remote Meeting

The Public Safety Committee will meet to discuss the Holistic Emergency Alternative Response
Team (HEART) proposal for a community-based, unarmed alternative public safety response.

City of Cambridge

Last Updated: 7/14/2021 2:55 PM
